hopobject.name: beaglebell
hopobject.body: beaglebone black based home intercom system with communications using beagleasterisk. VOIP video door phone unit based on beaglebone, indoor units based on cheap android tablets. Push-to-talk group call, video conferencing, surveillance using webcams and IP camera, participation from outside through internet, connection to telephone line, media center, web radio and much more...
hopobject.shortdesc: beaglebone black based home intercom, surveillance, entertainment system
